description.en: Apex is a High Yield, deflationary token built on Binance Smart Chain with a Strong Liquidity and Tax Mechanism . Holders gain a redistribution of 1 % of the transaction with increasing liquidity from our 11% tax on each trade. Apex Finance is launching our own APEXApp, APEXChart and APEXCard platform. We will also be introducing our very own Crypto wallet & Apex Vault. Our goal is to build a Robust Eco-system that allows our platform to be the one stop every trader needs for token swapping, charts and technical analysis.
